00020 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00021 /// CTreeNodeQuickEditor::CTreeNodeQuickEditor
00022 ///
00023 /// @description    This is the default constructor for the CTreeNodeEditor
00024 ///                 class.  It initializes member variables.
00025 /// @pre            None
00026 /// @post           Member variables are initialized.
00027 ///
00028 /// @param canvas:  This is a pointer to the canvas.
00029 ///
00030 /// @limitations    None
00031 ///
00032 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00033 CTreeNodeQuickEditor::CTreeNodeQuickEditor( QWidget *canvas )
00034 : QObject(canvas)
00035 {
00036     m_canvas = canvas;
00037     m_text = "";
00038     m_editingLabel = false;
00039     m_editingValue = false;
00040     m_selNode = NULL;
00041 }
00042

00058 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00059 /// CTreeNodeQuickEditor::canvasKeyPressEvent
00060 ///
00061 /// @description   This function handles key press events for editing the name
00062 ///                or values of a node.
00063 /// @pre           None
00064 /// @post          None
00065 ///
00066 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the QKeyEvent which contains information
00067 ///                about what triggered this function call.
00068 ///
00069 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the event was used and false otherwise.
00070 ///
00071 /// @limitations   None
00072 ///
00073 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00074 bool CTreeNodeQuickEditor::canvasKeyPressEvent( QKeyEvent *e )
00075 {
00076     //Check if there is no node selected and return false to indicate the
00077     //event wasn't used.
00078     if( m_selNode == NULL )
00079         return false;
00080 
00081     //Grab the character that was pressed.
00082     char key = (char)e->key();
00083 
00084     //Check if a letter was pressed.
00085     if( key >= Qt::Key_A && key <= Qt::Key_Z )
00086     {
00087         //Check if the name was being edited.  If not, stop any editing that
00088         //was occurring and start the new name with the letter pressed.
00089         if( !m_editingLabel )
00090         {
00091             stop();
00092             m_editingLabel = true;
00093         }
00094         m_text += key;
00095         m_model->editNodeName( m_selNode, m_text );
00096         m_canvas->update();
00097     }
00098     //Check if a number or the . or - was pressed.
00099     else if( (key >= Qt::Key_0 && key <= Qt::Key_9)
00100              || key == Qt::Key_Period || key == Qt::Key_Minus )
00101     {
00102         //Check if the value was being edited.  If not, stop any editing that
00103         //was occurring and start the new value with the key pressed.
00104         if( !m_editingValue )
00105         {
00106             stop();
00107             m_editingValue = true;
00108         }
00109         m_text += key;
00110         m_model->editNodeValue( m_selNode, m_text.toFloat() );
00111         m_canvas->update();
00112     }
00113     else
00114         return false;
00115 
00116     return true;
00117 }
00118 
00119 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00120 /// CTreeNodeQuickEditor::canvasMouseEvent
00121 ///
00122 /// @description   This function handles mouse events.
00123 /// @pre           None
00124 /// @post          None
00125 ///
00126 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the QMouse event.
00127 ///
00128 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the mouse event is used and false otherwise.
00129 ///
00130 /// @limitations   None
00131 ///
00132 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00133 bool CTreeNodeQuickEditor::canvasMouseEvent( QMouseEvent *e )
00134 {
00135     if( e->type() != QEvent::MouseMove )
00136         return false;
00137 
00138     if( m_model == NULL )
00139         return false;
00140 
00141     STreeNode *node = m_model->findNode( e->pos() );
00142     if( node != m_selNode )
00143     {
00144         m_selNode = node;
00145         stop();
00146         return true;
00147     }
00148 
00149     return false;
00150 }
00151 
00152 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00153 /// CTreeNodeQuickEditor::isEditing
00154 ///
00155 /// @description   This function returns true if the user is editing either a
00156 ///                node name or value, and false otherwise.
00157 /// @pre           None
00158 /// @post          None
00159 ///
00160 /// @return bool:  Returns true if a node name or value is being edited.
00161 ///
00162 /// @limitations   None
00163 ///
00164 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00165 bool CTreeNodeQuickEditor::isEditing()
00166 {
00167     return ( m_editingLabel || m_editingValue );
00168 }
00169 
00170 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00171 /// CTreeNodeEditor::setModel
00172 ///
00173 /// @description   This function sets the model pointer so the edit functions
00174 ///                may be properly called.
00175 /// @pre           None
00176 /// @post          The model pointer is updated.
00177 ///
00178 /// @param model:  This is a pointer to the model.
00179 ///
00180 /// @limitations   None
00181 ///
00182 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00183 void CTreeNodeQuickEditor::setModel( CTreeGraphModel *model )
00184 {
00185     m_model = model;
00186 }
00187 
00188 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00189 /// CTreeNodeEditor::stop
00190 ///
00191 /// @description  This function stops any editing that is occurring and resets
00192 ///               the locally stored name or value that was being used.  If
00193 ///               quick edit is being turned off (by passing a false value) then
00194 ///               the currently selected node is set to NULL to avoid errors.
00195 /// @pre          None
00196 /// @post         Any editing that was occurring is stopped.
00197 ///
00198 /// @param on:    This variable is used to indicate if quick edit is being
00199 ///               turned on or off.
00200 /// @limitations  None
00201 ///
00202 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00203 void CTreeNodeQuickEditor::stop( bool on )
00204 {
00205     m_editingLabel = false;
00206     m_editingValue = false;
00207     m_text = "";
00208     if ( !on )
00209         m_selNode = NULL;
00210 }
